titles.title: To promote ethics and prevent corruption in Department of Defense contracting and other activities, and for other purposes.
Department of Defense Ethics and Anti-corruption Act of 2019
Department of Defense Ethics and Anti-corruption Act of 2019
Department of Defense Ethics and Anti-corruption Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
